mapper.insert: INSERT INTO account ( uid, username, password, email, tel, gender, active, birth_date, country, university, work_type, face_image_url, address_id ) VALUES ( #{uid}, #{username}, #{password}, #{email}, #{tel}, #{gender}, #{active}, #{birthDate}, #{country}, #{university}, #{workType}, #{faceUrl}, #{addressId} )
mapper.update: UPDATE account SET deleted_at = NOW(), active = false WHERE id = #{id}
